sentence.Network_en: Passepartout, this is a scientific expedition, not a holiday!
sentence.Network_cn: 路路通, 这是一次科学的远行不是旅游!

sentence.Network_en: As he was strolling alone, Passepartout espied some violets among the shrubs.
sentence.Network_cn: 路路通正在这样信步游逛的时候,忽然在草丛里发现几棵紫萝兰.

sentence.Network_en: Passepartout stopped short, and eagerly listened to the engineer.
sentence.Network_cn: 司机这句话的每一个字路路通都听清楚了,他停住了脚步.

PerfectNetExp.abs: passepartout的中文意思沪江词库精选passepartout是什么意思、英语单词推荐、中英文句子翻译。passepartout英语翻译成中文: 万能钥匙  passepartout的例句:  even the.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from French, literally passes everywhere'
